text:

Click to share on Twitter (Opens in new window)

Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window)

Seth Rogen perfectly summed up how many feel about Ariana Grande and Pete Davidson’s whirlwind relationship.

Davidson, 24, shared a sultry photo of his fiancée on Instagram, and Grande, also 24, was quick to appreciate his fandom.

“I love you,” Grande commented on the photo, to which the “Saturday Night Live” star replied, “I love u more tho.”

Cue Rogen’s disdain.

“Guys seriously,” he wrote.

More than 2,600 Instagram users “liked” Rogen’s comment, but Davidson wasn’t one of them.

“@sethrogen when ur getting married to the hottest girl in the world you tell me how you’d act,” the “Set It Up” actor clapped back.

Grande and Davidson got engaged earlier this month after only a few weeks of dating, though Davidson only just confirmed it on “The Tonight Show.” Davidson dropped $93,000 for her massive pear-shaped ring, which the “No Tears Left to Cry” singer has had no problem flaunting around New York City.
title: Seth Rogen is sick of Ariana Grande and Pete Davidson’s flirting

meta_data.description: Like many followers, Seth Rogen has grown tired of Ariana Grande and Pete Davidson's constant flirting on social media, so he let his feelings be known in the comment section.
